pages.title: Charms
pages.text: PLACEHOLDER Charms of Keeping keep various things even after death. THIS VERSION SHOWS UP WHEN BAUBLES DOESN'T EXIST

pages.title: Charms
pages.text: PLACEHOLDER Charms of Keeping keep various things even after death. THIS VERSION SHOWS UP WHEN BAUBLES EXISTS

pages.title: Charms
pages.text: Aside from it looking like a non-distinct trinket, it has a curious inscription etched into the back: " 'Til death won't do us part."

pages.title: Charms
pages.text: Aside from it looking like a non-distinct trinket, it has a curious inscription etched into the back: " 'Til death won't do us part."$(br2)It's small enough to tuck away where one usually keeps their other baubles and bobs.
